Relevant Links: Google scholar, LinkedIn, Github.
Email: msl.asf97@gmail.com

I joined The Voleon Group as a Member of Research Staff in Fall 2025.

I graduated with a PhD in the Department of Electrical Engineering at University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign in Summer 2025, after working on the theory and applications of Topological data analysis under the guidance of Prof. Yuliy Baryshnikov. I also obtained a M.S degree in the Department of Mathematics at UIUC.

I interned at Nokia Bell Labs for Summer 2022, Fall 2022 and Spring 2023 where I am worked on the applications of Machine learning and Game theory to communication systems under Iraj Saniee and Carl Nuzman.

I graduated with a Dual degree (B.Tech + M.Tech) in Mechanical Engineering from the Indian Institute of Technology Bombay where I was advised by Prof. Debasish Chatterjee and Prof. Ravi Banavar in the Department of Systems and Control Engineering. I worked on problems in Nonlinear geometric control and Robust optimization during this period.
